  • Radius

    • Sessions
    • IP Pools

Radius

It shows everything related with Krill's Radius module.

Its menu has the following elements:

  • Sessions: It shows the active PPPoE sessions as well as the duplicated ones.
  • IP Pools: IPs' Pool with the availability statistics.
